mapper.insert: insert into oa_sys.Procurement (uid, releaseUid, items, price, reason, nextUid) values (#{uid}, #{releaseUid}, #{items}, #{price}, #{reason}, #{nextUid})
mapper.select: select uid, items, price, reason, status, count, nextUid, create_time, update_time from oa_sys.Procurement where releaseUid = #{releaseUid} and status >= 0 order by update_time desc
select uid, releaseUid, items, price, reason, status, count, nextUid, create_time, update_time from oa_sys.Procurement where uid = #{uid}
mapper.update: update oa_sys.Procurement set items = #{items}, price = #{price}, reason = #{reason}, status = #{status}, count = #{count}, nextUid= #{nextUid} where uid = #{uid}
